params.options: Additional options that could be needed for some vaults. E.g. for Uniswap this could be `deadline` param. For the exact bytes structure see concrete vault descriptions

returns.actualTokenAmounts: The amounts actually invested. It could be less than tokenAmounts (but not higher)

tvl().details: Generally it is the underlying token value of this contract in some other DeFi protocol. For example, for USDC Yearn Vault this would be total USDC balance that could be withdrawn for Yearn to this contract. The tvl itself is estimated in some range. Sometimes the range is exact, sometimes it's not

returns.maxTokenAmounts: Upper bound for total available balances estimation (nth tokenAmount corresponds to nth token in vaultTokens)
returns.minTokenAmounts: Lower bound for total available balances estimation (nth tokenAmount corresponds to nth token in vaultTokens)

_aggregatedInactiveFixedTokenBalance.details: Sum of fixed token balances of all positions in the trackedPositionsarray, apart from the balance of the currently active position

_aggregatedInactiveMargin.details: Sum of margins of all positions in the trackedPositions array,apart from the margin of the currently active position

_aggregatedInactiveVariableTokenBalance.details: Sum of variable token balances of all positions in the trackedPositionsarray, apart from the balance of the currently active position

_currentPositionIndex.details: Index into the trackedPositions array of the currently active LP position of the Vault

_leverageWad.details: The leverage used for LP positions on Voltz (in wad)

_marginEngine.details: The margin engine of Voltz Protocol

_marginMultiplierPostUnwindWad.details: The multiplier used to decide how much margin is left in partially unwound positions on Voltz (in wad)

_positionToIndexPlusOne.details: Maps a given Voltz position to its index into the trackedPositions array,which is artifically 1-indexed by the mapping.

_rateOracle.details: The rate oracle of Voltz Protocol

_settledPositionsCount.details: Number of positions settled and withdrawn from counting from the first positionin the trackedPositions array

_termEndTimestampWad.details: The unix termEndTimestamp of the MarginEngine in Wad

trackedPositions.details: Array of Vault-owned positions on Voltz with strictly positive cashflow

PRBMathUD60x18__FromUintOverflow(uint256.notice: Emitted when converting a basic integer to the fixed-point format format overflows UD60x18.

PRBMath__MulDivFixedPointOverflow(uint25.notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

PositionRebalance((int24,int24),int256,(.notice: Emitted when active LP position is changed

PositionSettledAndMarginWithdrawn(int24,.notice: Emitted when a single Vault-owned position is settled and withdrawn from

PullWithdraw(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when tokens are withdrawn from the Vault

PushDeposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when tokens are deposited into the Vault

VaultSettle(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when multilpe Vault-owned positions are settled and withdrawn from

currentPosition().notice: Returns the currently active LP position of the Vault

initialized().notice: Checks if the vault is initialized

isVaultToken(address).notice: Checks if a token is vault token

leverageWad().notice: Returns the leverage used for LP positions on Voltz (in wad)

marginEngine().notice: Reference to the margin engine of Voltz Protocol

marginMultiplierPostUnwindWad().notice: Returns the multiplier used to decide how much margin is left in partially unwound positions on Voltz (in wad)

periphery().notice: Reference to the periphery of Voltz Protocol

pull(address,address[],uint256[],bytes).notice: Pulls tokens from the underlying protocol to the `to` address.

push(address[],uint256[],bytes).notice: Pushes tokens on the vault balance to the underlying protocol. For example, for Yearn this operation will take USDC from the contract balance and convert it to yUSDC.

rateOracle().notice: Reference to the rate oracle of Voltz Protocol

rebalance((int24,int24)).notice: Vault's available funds are moved to a new LP position

reclaimTokens(address[]).notice: Claim ERC20 tokens from vault balance to zero vault.

setLeverageWad(uint256).notice: Sets the leverage used for LP positions on Voltz (in wad)

setMarginMultiplierPostUnwindWad(uint256.notice: Sets the multiplier used to decide how much margin is left in partially unwound positions on Voltz (in wad)

settleVault(uint256).notice: Settles up to batchSize Vault-owned positions on Voltz and withdraws margin

settleVaultPositionAndWithdrawMargin((in.notice: Settles Vault-owned position on Voltz and withdraws margin

transferAndPush(address,address[],uint25.notice: The same as `push` method above but transfers tokens to vault balance prior to calling push. After the `push` it returns all the leftover tokens back (`push` method doesn't guarantee that tokenAmounts will be invested in full).

tvl().notice: Total value locked for this contract.

vamm().notice: Reference to the vamm of Voltz Protocol

vaultGovernance().notice: Address of the Vault Governance for this contract.

voltzVaultHelper().notice: Returns the address of the associated Voltz Vault Helper

userdoc.notice: Vault that interfaces Voltz protocol in the integration layer on the liquidity provider (LP) side.
